page.title: 05Farming
page.content: The main farming enterprise in the area is dairy farming.Land is medium to heavy with a high water table.The average size of field is eleven acres and they are generally bounded by hawthorn hedges.This makes a good stock proof fence & wind break.The main crops grown are wheat,barley and peas.The land is kept in good condiion by spreading manure on it in the Winter & nitrogen and potash in the Spring.This produces good lush grass for the cows to graze & for making into silage for the Winter.The 1980's will be remembered by farmers as a time when there was a surplus of all products produced from the land.The dairy farmers have had milk quotas put on them forcing them to cut milk production figures by ten percent and this has had quite a marked effect on this area.
